about_the_game:
Explore the mysteries of Japanese Sengoku era authentically set up with objects and feudal characters. Enjoy the modern world with cities, schools and offices. Or take a trip to a long-away future, brimming with robots, spaceships and high-tech devices.

This pack has it all! 23 Tilesets, Walking Sprites, Battlers, Face, Bust-up, Battle Back and Music are all packed in one. It contains materials from the original RMDS+ product, from the popular game Corpse Party as well as unique custom material created by our artists.

This long-awaited MV compatible resource pack is a companion set to RPG Maker DS Resource Pack for MV created in the same general style. It's one resource pack you do not want to miss!

FEATURES:

* 23 Tilesets (TileA1-TileD) to create 4 distinct areas (feudal Japan, modern, futuristic and custom ship)
* Over 100 Walking Sprite characters (including hero characters and villains)
* 43 Battlers, as well as 124 "chibi" pixel Battlers
* Faceset: 40 characters x 4 emotions each = 160 graphics!
* Bust-up (Pictures): 40 characters x 4 emotions each = 160 graphics!
* 23 Battlebacks (10 ground images: floor, tatami, grass, road etc. / 13 background images: feudal exterior, modern store, residential, school, spaceship etc. )
* Animations: doors, gates, car, bird, chest, boat, UFO, bus etc.
* System balloons
* 20 BGM Tracks (M4A / OGG formats included)
* Bonus: 19 characters with full-scale image x 4 emotions each = 76 graphics
* Sample Maps!
* This pack is licensed for use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker only! Although editing is permitted for this pack, Faceset and Bust-up graphics are not permitted to be edited
